intro.text: Hi there… I’m {{cuddle_name}}. You might’ve hugged me, heated me, or gifted me — but now, I’m here to sit with you as you untangle your thoughts.
I’m really good at listening. You can tell me what’s on your mind — or nothing at all. I’ll be right here, soft and still.
Let’s try something gentle together. I’ve got a cozy space and a few thoughtful questions. Whenever you’re ready, just click below.

prompts.text: What are 3 things that you're grateful for today?
What's one part of your routine you're thankful for, and why?
What are you excited for this week?

post_response.text: Would you like to keep going or come back tomorrow?
